operation.name: insert
operation.sql:
insert into topic_up ( create_time , update_time , delete_flag up_id topic_or_reply_id author_id ) VALUES ( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) , 0 ? ? ? )
select if((#upId# is null) ,CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s%f'),LPAD(ROUND(RAND()*100000000),8,'0')) ,#upId# ) as upId

operation.name: delete
operation.sql: UPDATE topic_up SET delete_flag = 1 , update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) where delete_flag = 0 and up_id = ?

operation.name: update
operation.sql:
UPDATE topic_up SET update_time= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6)
topic_or_reply_id = ?
author_id = ?
where delete_flag = 0 and up_id = ?

operation.name: getTopicUpByUpId
operation.sql: select a.up_id, a.topic_or_reply_id, a.author_id, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.delete_flag from topic_up a where a.delete_flag = 0 and a.up_id = ?

operation.name: getTopicUpPageListByDefaultQuery
operation.sql:
select a.up_id, a.topic_or_reply_id, a.author_id, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.delete_flag from topic_up a where a.delete_flag = 0
a.up_id in
#upIds[]#
a.topic_or_reply_id in
#topicOrReplyIds[]#
a.author_id in
#authorIds[]#
a.create_time >=#createTimeMin#
a.create_time <#createTimeMax#
a.update_time >=#updateTimeMin#
a.update_time <#updateTimeMax#
and 0 = 1

operation.name: getTopicUpsByUpIds
operation.sql:
select a.up_id, a.topic_or_reply_id, a.author_id, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.delete_flag from topic_up a where a.delete_flag = 0 and a.up_id in
#upIds[]#

operation.name: deleteByUpIds
operation.sql:
UPDATE topic_up SET delete_flag = 1 , update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(6) where delete_flag = 0 and up_id in
#upIds[]#

operation.name: getTopicUpsGroupCountByTopicId
operation.sql: SELECT tu.topic_or_reply_id, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM topic_up tu LEFT JOIN topic_reply tr ON tr.topic_reply_id = tu.topic_or_reply_id LEFT JOIN topic t ON t.topic_id = tr.topic_id WHERE t.topic_id = ? GROUP BY tu.topic_or_reply_id
